CustomField.formula:
OR(
OR( ispickval(CPE_DCS_Stage__c, ""), ispickval(CPE_DCS_Stage__c, "Review Order"), ispickval(CPE_DCS_Stage__c, "Internal Call Scheduled") ),
AND( ispickval(Broadband_COE_Stage__c, "DPI Order Completed"),
OR( ispickval(Hot_Cut_Stage__c, "Revised CDC Uploaded"), ispickval(Hot_Cut_Stage__c, "Checklist in Progress"), ispickval(Hot_Cut_Stage__c, "Checklist Complete"), ispickval(Hot_Cut_Stage__c, "Schedule Migration Call") ) ) )
CustomField.label: Network COE Lock
